description:
Package log now contains a useful interface and functions to act on it.
    The package now includes an interface that can be implemented for the logger object to log the implementing object.  Also added two helper functions for this feature that log to stdout and stderr.  Tests were also added for this feature for use during build.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review the following change.

Thanks but no thanks.

If you want to make an object loggable, I suggest
putting that functionality in its String method instead.
Then you can use it not only with the ordinary log
methods but also with any other routine that converts
objects to strings (fmt, template, etc.)
